As an AI language model, I cannot predict the future, but it is entirely possible that we may one day view historical figures in a more balanced and nuanced way, acknowledging both their achievements and failings. 

Historians and scholars are increasingly recognizing the importance of examining history through a critical lens and acknowledging the negative aspects of the actions of past figures. This process of reassessment and re-evaluation is ongoing and will likely continue for years to come. 

Moreover, as society becomes more diverse and inclusive, there is a growing demand for representation and recognition of the contributions of marginalized groups, which can lead to a revision of the traditional historical narrative. 

Ultimately, an honest and nuanced approach to history allows us to gain a better understanding of our past and the lessons we can learn from it, enabling us to move forward in a more informed and equitable manner.
